timeline.bodyText:
This comment should be reworded, converted into javadoc and attached to the public methods getFixed() and setFixed(Boolean fixed).
Returns true if the version is specified by user and the product can not be upgraded or downgraded.
timeline.author: julianladisch
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -33,6 +33,10 @@
     pending, deploy, invoke, undeploy, done
   }
 
+  // if true, it specifies that the id is specified by user and can not be changed

timeline.bodyText: I don't see the need why this should have three values: true, false, null. Can a boolean (with true and false only) been used instead?
timeline.author: julianladisch
